title: Anne Meara, Half Of Husband-Wife Comedy Team, Dies At 85
teaser: Anne Meara died Saturday in New York. She had a long varied career in show business and was one half of the 1960s comedy duo Stiller and Meara. She was marred to Jerry Stiller. Her son is Ben Stiller.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
